name: Rags to Riches
description: A humble protagonist rises from obscurity to wealth, power, or status through perseverance and personal growth

initial_wretchedness.name: Initial Wretchedness
initial_wretchedness.description: The hero is in a lowly position, oppressed or undervalued

call_to_adventure.name: Call to Adventure
call_to_adventure.description: An opportunity for advancement presents itself

getting_out.name: Getting Out
getting_out.description: The hero takes the first steps toward improvement

first_success.name: First Success
first_success.description: Initial achievements bring hope and confidence

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: A major setback threatens to undo all progress

final_triumph.name: Final Triumph
final_triumph.description: The hero overcomes the crisis and achieves transformation
